allow: Bash(del /Q REFACTOR_GUIDE.md CLEANUP_SCRIPT.md REFACTOR_COMPLETE.md SETUP_COMPLETE.md HONEST_STATUS.md)

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Daily Priority - Islamic Productivity App

Daily Priority is a comprehensive Islamic productivity application that helps Muslims organize their daily tasks around prayer times and Islamic principles.

Features:
- Prayer times integration with notifications
- Smart task management with Islamic productivity principles
- Dunya & Akhirah goal tracking
- Islamic calendar with Hijri dates
- Gratitude journal for daily reflection
- Progress analytics and insights
- Focus mode with Pomodoro timer
- Habit tracking
- AI-powered task suggestions
- Beautiful marketing landing page with Islamic quotes

Tech Stack:
- Next.js 15 with App Router and Turbopack
- TypeScript
- Prisma ORM
- NextAuth.js for authentication
- Framer Motion for animations
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- Radix UI components

This platform is built as Sadaqah Jariyah for the Muslim Ummah.
100% Free • Always Free • For the Sake of Allah
EOF
)")
Bash(then ls "d:\100 great python projects\Daily Priority\web\src\components\shared")
Bash(else echo "Shared directory does not exist")
